entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 2:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: E 18 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
